nodes.text: Lechee was a Gran male vendor who resided in the Vargo Spaceport on the planet Varkana. He was secretly a contact for the First Order, and reported the Resistance spy Norath Kev.

Lechee first appeared in "The Missing Agent," a 2019 episode of the television show Star Wars Resistance, voiced by Fred Armisen. He was  named after Lucasfilm Story Group member Leland Chee, who also provided a temporary recording of the character's dialog.
